text: "My Lovin' (You're Never Gonna Get It)" is a 1992 song by En Vogue and is the leading from their second studio album Funky Divas. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Greece, number 9 in Ireland, number 10 in the Netherlands and Canada and number 11 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== * US 12-inch single # "My Lovin'" (Theo's Cheaptrick remix) – 6:46 # "My Lovin'" (Radio Active) – 4:50 # "My Lovin'" (The Morning After dub) – 5:37 # "My Lovin'" (Hyperradio) – 5:13 * UK CD single # "My Lovin'" (radio edit) – 4:16 # "My Lovin'" (extended) – 5:03 # "My Lovin'" (LP version) – 4:44 # "My Lovin'" (extended edit) – 4:11 * US CD single # "My Lovin'" (Radio Active #2) – 4:41 # "My Lovin'" (Hyper radio mix) – 5:12 # "My Lovin'" (Theo's Cheaptrick remix) – 4:41 == References == Category:1992 songs Category:En Vogue songs
title: My Lovin' (You're Never Gonna Get It)
